text: == Events == The Treaty of Utrecht was signed ending the Anglo-Hanseatic War in February == Births == * Ludovico Ariosto (d. 1533), Italian Poet * Giulia Farnese (d. 1524) mistress to Pope Alexander VI * Juan Ponce de Leon (d. 1521), Spanish explorer * Perkin Warbeck (d. 1499) English Throne Pretender == Deaths == * Guillaume Dufay, Franco-Flemish Renaissance composer
